issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently function name for the permanent function is getting formed as dbName.WINDOW_FUNC_PREFIX+functionName where as function registry has function name as WINDOW_FUNC_PREFIX+dbName.functionName. This is leading to invalid function error when we use permanent function with window function. Fix has been done such that we form the permanent function name rightly as WINDOW_FUNC_PREFIX+dbName+.+functionName so that it matches with the name in function registry. The functionality for built-in/temporary function would remain the same.
fields.summary: As a hive user, I am facing issues using permanent UDAF's.

comments.body: Almost 2 years since this bug was reported, but I am experiencing the same issue on both versions 1.2.1 and 2.1.1.  Curious what other watchers on this ticket have done as a workaround?

Currently window function name is getting formed as dbName.WINDOW_FUNC_PREFIX+functionName where as function registry has function name as WINDOW_FUNC_PREFIX+dbName.functionName. This is leading to invalid function error when we use permanent function with window function. I have corrected the way we form window function name to WINDOW_FUNC_PREFIX+dbName+.+functionName so that it matches with the name in function registry.
Please review the changes.
